title: Palo Alto Networks security advisory (AV25-515)
description: On August 13, 2025, Palo Alto Networks published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Checkov by Prisma Cloud 3.2.0  versions prior to 3.2.449
Cortex XDR Broker VM 28.0.0  versions prior to 28.0.52
GlobalProtect App 6.3 Linux  versions prior to 6.3.3
GlobalProtect App 6.3 Windows  versions prior to 6.3.3-h2 (6.3.3-c676)
GlobalProtect App 6.2 Windows  versions prior to 6.2.8-h3 (6.2.8-c263)
Prisma Access Browser  versions prior to 138.69.4.184
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
